readability_reflection: They both felt equally as readable once I got the hang of it, but at first, string concatenation was more readable. I think this is because I am used to the notion of + or so than insertion with interpolation.
comprehension_debugging: At first, yes. Using interpolation messed up my ability slightly more. This is simply because my brain needed a moment to input the given variable into the place where the brackets were.
preference_rationale: If I were tasked to choose, I would choose concatenation. This is because for myself, It's more easily readable, and frankly more simple.
learning_curve: I think any understanding anyone has of coding would help ease understanding. If I needed to give a reason why, It's simply because I'm familiar with the syntax of some coding, which helps me to read it.
suggestions_improvement: I think both ways are pretty simple, and there's nothing to change that could make it significantly easier to understand. I enjoy both, with the little experience I have.
